pages.text: Use this network to teleport the player from a Teleport Sender to the nearest Teleport Target of the same color on the network, as determined by the shortest path through Teleport Boosters from the sender to the target.

Right click on the Teleport Sender to trigger a teleport. You need to fuel the teleport by putting eyes of ender in the Teleport Target. A teleport will consume 1 eye of ender per Sender, Booster and Target on the path.
